title: AI tool can take a cattle's temperature with only a photo
description: What if you could look into a cow's face and know whether it had a fever? A new tool from the Artificial Intelligence and Computer Vision Lab at the University of Arkansas uses artificial intelligence and thermal cameras to estimate the body temperature of cattle.

title: AI, cybersecurity power 40% of campus hires in Bengaluru
description: Bengaluru: Bengaluru's campus placement season has crossed the halfway mark, and artificial intelligence (AI) and cybersecurity are leading the charge.
content: Bengaluru: Bengaluru's campus placement season has crossed the halfway mark, and artificial intelligence (AI) and cybersecurity are leading the charge, accounting for nearly 40% of hires. Demand for AI roles has surged by 50% compared to last year, p... [2023 chars]

title: Anthropic Said to Be in Talks to Raise Funding at a $350 Billion Valuation
description: The artificial intelligence start-up, which competes with OpenAI, is aiming to raise around $10 billion amid talk of a potential initial public offering.
content: Anthropic, the high-flying artificial intelligence start-up that makes the Claude chatbot, plans to raise $10 billion in funding that would value it at roughly $350 billion, nearly doubling its valuation from just four months ago, according to three ... [1540 chars]

title: Why Sandisk, Memory Stocks Have Soared While the AI Trade Treads Water
description: Data storage stocks soared after Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang, speaking at the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas on Monday, highlighted the artificial intelligence industry’s huge demand for memory and storage hardware.
content:

title: Gold, private credit are parts of a diversified portfolio, BlackRock says
description: Investors should diversify beyond artificial-intelligence stocks and traditional bonds in 2026, according to BlackRock's latest outlook.

title: Google, Character.AI settle Florida mom's suit over son's suicide
description: Alphabet's Google and artificial-intelligence startup Character.AI have agreed to settle a lawsuit from a Florida woman who alleged a Character chatbot led to the suicide of her 14-year-old son, according to a Wednesday court filing.
content:
Alphabet’s Google and artificial-intelligence startup Character.AI have agreed to settle a lawsuit from a Florida woman who alleged a Character chatbot led to the suicide of her 14-year-old son, according to a Wednesday court filing.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - AI Stocks Propel S&P 500 to New Heights Amid Market Fluctuations
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.
